title: Strongest Current Account Balance
description: In 2023, Kuwait's current account balance was 31.40% of its GDP, showcasing its robust economic position globally.

title: Highest Internet Usage Among Females
description: In 2023, 100% of the female population in Kuwait used the internet, indicating widespread digital access.

title: Universal Access to Sanitation Services
description: By 2022, 100% of Kuwait's population had access to safely managed sanitation services, reflecting high public health standards.

title: Lowest Vulnerable Employment Among Females
description: In 2023, only 0.02% of female employment in Kuwait was considered vulnerable, highlighting strong job security for women.

title: High Water Stress Levels
description: In 2021, Kuwait faced significant water stress, with freshwater withdrawal at 3850.5% of available resources, indicating severe water scarcity.

title: Negative Taxes Less Subsidies on Products
description: In 2023, Kuwait recorded -$10.67 billion in taxes less subsidies on products, reflecting a unique fiscal structure.

title: Low Secondary Income Receipts
description: Kuwait's secondary income receipts were at $6.01 million in 2023, one of the lowest globally, indicating limited income from abroad.

title: Stable Exchange Rate
description: Kuwait maintained a stable official exchange rate of 0.3067 LCU per US$ in 2024, reflecting currency stability.

title: Low Population of Young Males
description: In 2023, males aged 20-24 constituted only 4.20% of the male population, indicating a demographic trend towards an older population.
